project.英释: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

paradox.英释: a statement that seems impossible because it contains two opposing ideas that are both true

crucial.英释: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it

vehicle.英释: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

content.英释: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

startle.英释: to make someone suddenly surprised or slightly shocked

fiction.英释: books and stories about imaginary people and events

vitally.英释: in a very important or necessary way

riotous.英释: noisy or violent, especially in a public place

approve.英释: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

session.英释: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

exhaust.英释: to make someone feel extremely tired

grocery.英释: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

scratch.英释: a small cut on someone’s skin

undergo.英释: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

triumph.英释: an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

gallery.英释: a large building where people can see famous pieces of art

entitle.中释: 使具有权利，使具有资格
entitle.英释: to give someone the official right to do or have something

relieve.英释: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

regular.英释: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

observe.英释: to do what you are supposed to do according to a law or agreement

suppose.英释: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know

promote.英释: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

cruelty.英释: behaviour or actions that deliberately cause pain to people or animals

takeoff.英释: Takeoff is the beginning of a flight, when an aircraft leaves the ground

dropout.英释: someone who leaves school or college before they have finished

replace.英释: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

imitate.英释: to copy the way someone behaves, speaks, moves etc, especially in order to make people laugh

revenue.英释: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

embrace.中释: 拥抱；欣然接受，乐意采纳 (新思想、意见、宗教等)
embrace.英释: to put your arms around someone and hold them in a friendly or loving way

violate.英释: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

privacy.英释: the state of being free from public attention

capable.英释: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

swallow.英释: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

consult.英释: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

predict.英释: to say that something will happen, before it happens

compare.英释: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

contact.英释: to write to or telephone someone

virtual.英释: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world

utility.中释: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
utility.英释: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

leisure.英释: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

density.英释: the degree to which an area is filled with people or things

revenge.英释: something you do in order to punish someone who has harmed or offended you

reverse.英释: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described.

invalid.英释: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable

instant.中释: 立即的；紧急的；速溶的，方便的

massive.中释: (尺寸、数量、规模) 非常大的
massive.英释: very large in size, quantity, or extent

alcohol.英释: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

delight.英释: a feeling of great pleasure and satisfaction

element.英释: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

dispute.英释: to argue or disagree with someone

deserve.英释: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

confuse.英释: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else

penalty.英释: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement

comment.英释: an opinion that you express about someone or something

reserve.英释: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

achieve.英释: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard

address.英释: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

process.英释: to deal with an official document, request etc in the usual way

citizen.英释: someone who lives in a particular town, country, or state

pioneer.英释: to be the first person to do, invent or use something

sustain.英释: to make something continue to exist or happen for a period of time

variety.英释: a lot of things of the same type that are different from each other in some way

tedious.英释: something that is tedious continues for a long time and is not interesting

install.英释: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used

monitor.英释: to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

refusal.英释: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

concept.英释: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

feature.英释: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical

reframe.英释: to support or enclose (a picture, photograph, etc) in a new or different frame

require.英释: if you are required to do or have something, a law or rule says you must do it or have it

specify.英释: to state something in an exact and detailed way

consume.英释: to use time, energy, goods etc

lengthy.英释: continuing for a long time, often too long

distant.英释: far away in space or time

trigger.英释: to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

include.英释: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

consist.英释: to be formed from two or more things or people

benefit.英释: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

pattern.英释: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

suspect.英释: someone who is thought to be guilty of a crime

analyze.英释: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it

version.英释: a copy of something that has been changed so that it is slightly different

recover.英释: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

diploma.英释: a document showing that a student has successfully completed their  high school  or university education

canteen.英释: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply

prevent.英释: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something

qualify.英释: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

arrange.英释: to organize or make plans for something such as a meeting, party, or trip

bargain.英释: something you buy cheaply or for less than its usual price

neutral.英释: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

therapy.英释: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

durable.英释: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot

context.英释: the situation, events, or information that are related to something and that help you to understand it

witness.英释: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

inherit.英释: to receive money, property etc from someone after they have died

insight.英释: the ability to understand and realize what people or situations are really like

sponsor.英释: to give money to a sports event, theatre, institution etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise

loyalty.英释: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc

setting.英释: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

display.英释: to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

deliver.英释: to make a speech etc to a lot of people

confirm.英释: to show that something is definitely true, especially by providing more proof

mission.英释: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

harvest.英释: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them

measure.英释: to find the size, length, or amount of something, using standard units such as  inch es  ,metres etc

squeeze.英释: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

combine.英释: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

council.英释: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

prepare.英释: to make plans or arrangements for something that will happen in the future

inquiry.英释: a question you ask in order to get information

tension.英释: a nervous worried feeling that makes it impossible for you to relax

welfare.英释: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

prevail.英释: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time

maximum.英释: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed

ashamed.英释: feeling very sorry and embarrassed because of something you have done

tuition.英释: the money you pay for being taught

private.英释: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

concern.英释: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

contest.英释: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

symptom.英释: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

outline.英释: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details

complex.英释: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

tighten.英释: to close or fasten something firmly by turning it

physics.英释: the science concerned with the study of physical objects and substances, and of natural forces such as light, heat, and movement

conform.英释: to obey a law, rule etc

decline.英释: to decrease in quantity or importance

selfish.英释: caring only about yourself and not about other people – used to show disapproval

passion.英释: a very strong belief or feeling about something

inflate.英释: to fill something with air or gas so it becomes larger, or to become filled with air or gas

despite.英释: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

request.英释: a polite or formal demand for something

dictate.英释: an order, rule, or principle that you have to obey

prosper.英释: if people or businesses prosper, they grow and develop in a successful way, especially by becoming rich or making a large profit

gesture.英释: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

evident.英释: easy to see, notice, or understand

retreat.英释: to move away from someone or something

neglect.英释: to fail to look after someone or something properly

incline.英释: if a situation, fact etc inclines you to do or think something, it influences you towards a particular action or opinion

genuine.英释: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

painful.中释: 痛苦的，疼痛的，令人不快的
painful.英释: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts

surpass.英释: to be even better or greater than someone or something else

advance.英释: to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

charity.英释: an organization that gives money, goods, or help to people who are poor, sick etc

average.英释: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

visible.英释: something that is visible can be seen

restore.英释: to make something return to its former state or condition

inspire.英释: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

justice.英释: fairness in the way people are treated

provoke.英释: to cause a reaction or feeling, especially a sudden one

release.英释: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

explore.英释: to discuss or think about something carefully

exploit.英释: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

laundry.中释: 要洗的衣服；刚洗过的衣物；洗衣房
laundry.英释: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed

wedding.英释: a marriage ceremony, especially one with a religious service

outcome.英释: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

deprive.英释: If you deprive someone of something that they want or need, you take it away from them, or you prevent them from having it

justify.英释: to give an acceptable explanation for something that other people think is unreasonable

mystery.英释: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

harmony.英释: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

reflect.英释: to show or be a sign of a particular situation or feeling

retrain.英释: to learn or to teach someone the skills that are needed to do a different job

caution.英释: to warn someone that something might be dangerous, difficult etc

passive.英释: someone who is passive tends to accept things that happen to them or things that people say to them, without taking any action

ancient.英释: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

appoint.中释: 任命，委派；约定，确定，指定
appoint.英释: to choose someone for a position or a job

dilemma.英释: a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what to do, because all the choices seem equally good or equally bad

intense.英释: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly

mislead.英释: to make someone believe something that is not true by giving them information that is false or not complete

dessert.英释: sweet food served after the main part of a meal

tremble.英释: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened

acquire.英释: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

archive.英释: a place where a large number of historical records are stored, or the records that are stored

compete.英释: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

quality.英释: how good or bad something is

pension.英释: an amount of money paid regularly by the government or company to someone who does not work any more, for example because they have reached the age when people stop working or because they are ill

involve.英释: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

attempt.英释: to try to do something, especially something difficult

fitness.英释: when you are healthy and strong enough to do hard work or play sports

antique.英释: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

protest.英释: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something

finance.英释: to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

offense.英释: an illegal action or a crime

recycle.英释: to put used objects or materials through a special process so that they can be used again

mineral.英释: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and use

recruit.英释: someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

restock.英释: If you restock something such as a shelf, refrigerator, or shop, you fill it with food or other goods to replace what you have used or sold

convict.英释: to prove or officially announce that someone is guilty of a crime after a  trial  in a law court

resolve.英释: to find a satisfactory way of dealing with a problem or difficulty

analyse.中释: 分析； 分解； 解析
analyse.英释: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it

pretend.英释: to behave as if something is true when in fact you know it is not, in order to deceive people or for fun

conceal.中释: 把…隐藏起来， 掩盖， 隐瞒

possess.英释: to have a particular quality or ability

chapter.英释: one of the parts into which a book is divided

harbour.英释: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

concede.中释: 承认， 承认…为真； 承认失败； 允许， 让予； 让步， 认输
concede.英释: to admit that something is true or correct, although you wish it were not true

connect.中释: 连接， 结合， 联系； 给…接通电话
connect.英释: to join two or more things together

rebuild.中释: 重建， 改造； 复原
rebuild.英释: to build something again, after it has been damaged or destroyed

surgery.中释: 外科， 外科手术； 手术室
surgery.英释: medical treatment in which a surgeon cuts open your body to repair or remove something inside

liberal.中释: 心胸宽大的， 慷慨的； 自由的， 自由主义的
liberal.英释: allowing people or organizations a lot of political or economic freedom

violent.中释: 暴力引起的， 暴力的； 猛烈的， 剧烈的
violent.英释: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc

enlarge.中释: 扩大， 扩展， 放大
enlarge.英释: if you enlarge something, or if it enlarges, it increases in size or scale

fantasy.中释: 想象， 幻想； 想象的产物
fantasy.英释: an exciting and unusual experience or situation you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen

nowhere.英释: not in any place or to any place

airline.英释: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

perform.中释: 做， 履行， 完成； 表演， 演出； 工作情况， 表现
perform.英释: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

halfway.中释: 中途的；部分的；不彻底的
halfway.英释: at a middle point in space or time between two things

outlook.中释: 观点， 看法； 展望， 前景
outlook.英释: your general attitude to life and the world

breadth.中释: 宽度； 幅度， 幅面
breadth.英释: the distance from one side of something to the other

catalog.中释: 将…编入目录， 将编目

channel.中释: 海峡， 水道， 航道； 渠道， 途径； 频道
channel.英释: a television station and all the programmes that it broadcasts

proceed.中释: 继续进行； 行进， 前进
proceed.英释: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

dismiss.中释: 不再考虑； 解雇， 解散； 驳回
dismiss.英释: to remove someone from their job

propose.中释: 提议， 建议， 提出； 提名， 推荐； 打算， 计划； 求婚
propose.英释: to suggest something as a plan or course of action

draught.英释: draught beer is served from a large container rather than a bottle

despair.英释: to feel that there is no hope at all

circuit.中释: 电路， 线路； 环行， 巡行
circuit.英释: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

orderly.英释: arranged or organized in a sensible or neat way

product.中释: 产品， 产物； 乘积
product.英释: something that is grown or made in a factory in large quantities, usually in order to be sold

heading.中释: 标题， 题词， 题名； 新闻提要
heading.英释: the title written at the beginning of a piece of writing, or at the beginning of part of a book

vinegar.英释: a sour-tasting liquid made from malt or wine that is used to improve the taste of food or to preserve it

hostile.英释: angry and deliberately unfriendly towards someone, and ready to argue with them

suspend.中释: 暂停， 终止； 吊， 悬
suspend.英释: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time

beneath.中释: 在…下方；低于，次于；在…掩盖下；连…也不值得，有失…的身份

senator.英释: a member of the Senate or a senate

thirsty.英释: feeling that you want or need a drink

improve.中释: 变得更好； 改善； 提高
improve.英释: to make something better, or to become better

scenery.中释: 风景， 景色； 舞台布景
scenery.英释: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc

opening.中释: 口子， 洞， 孔； 开始； 空缺
opening.英释: a hole or space in something

conduct.中释: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
conduct.英释: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

harness.英释: a set of leather bands used to control a horse or to attach it to a vehicle it is pulling

respond.中释: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
respond.英释: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

liberty.中释: 自由； 许可， 准许； 过于随便， 放肆
liberty.英释: Liberty is the freedom to live your life in the way that you want, without interference from other people or the authorities

mankind.英释: all humans considered as a group

exclaim.英释: to say something suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited

uncover.中释: 揭露， 暴露； 揭开…的盖子
uncover.英释: to find out about something that has been kept secret

reality.中释: 现实， 实际； 真实
reality.英释: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

workman.中释: 工人， 劳动者， 工匠
workman.英释: someone who does physical work such as building, repairing things etc

sunrise.英释: the time when the sun first appears in the morning

battery.中释: 电池， 蓄电池； 排炮， 炮组； 一系列， 一套
battery.英释: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

routine.中释: 例行公事，惯例，惯常的程序
routine.英释: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do

divorce.英释: the legal ending of a marriage

surplus.英释: an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

refresh.中释: 振作精神， 恢复活力
refresh.英释: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

diagram.中释: 图解， 图表， 简图
diagram.英释: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

torture.英释: to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel

tragedy.中释: 悲剧， 惨事， 惨案； 悲剧艺术
tragedy.英释: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

cabinet.英释: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

optical.中释: 眼的， 光学的， 视觉的
optical.英释: relating to machines or processes which are concerned with light, images, or the way we see things

fashion.中释: 样子， 方式； 时尚； 流行款式
fashion.英释: a style of clothes, hair etc that is popular at a particular time

preface.中释: 序言， 前言， 引言
preface.英释: an introduction at the beginning of a book or speech

overall.中释: 全面的， 总体的， 全部的

receipt.中释: 发票， 收据； 收入， 进款； 收到， 接到
receipt.英释: a piece of paper that you are given which shows that you have paid for something

enclose.中释: 围住， 圈起； 附上； 把…装入信封
enclose.英释: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

disease.中释: 病， 疾病； 不健全； 弊端
disease.英释: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

generic.中释: 【生物】 属的， 类的； 一般的， 普通的
generic.英释: relating to a whole group of things rather than to one thing

gravity.中释: 重力， 引力； 严重性； 严肃， 庄重
gravity.英释: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

typical.英释: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

cabbage.英释: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves

whoever.中释: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
whoever.英释: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc

payment.英释: an amount of money that has been or must be paid

supreme.中释: 最高的， 最大的； 极度的， 最重要的
supreme.英释: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

provide.英释: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

worship.英释: to admire and love someone very much

survive.中释: 从…逃出，幸免于；从中挺过来；比…活得长
survive.英释: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

initial.英释: the first letter of someone’s first name

turbine.英释: an engine or motor in which the pressure of a liquid or gas moves a special wheel around

rainbow.英释: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

account.英释: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

railway.英释: a system of tracks along which trains run, or a system of trains

profile.英释: to write or give a short description of someone or something

venture.英释: a new business activity that involves taking risks

journal.中释: 日报， 杂志， 日志
journal.英释: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

hearing.中释: 听力， 听觉； 听力所及之距离； 意见听取会； 申辩的机会
hearing.英释: the sense which you use to hear sounds

volcano.英释: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava(= very hot liquid rock ) is sometimes forced out

dialect.中释: 方言， 土语， 地方话
dialect.英释: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

faculty.中释: 才能， 能力； 系， 科； 全体教员
faculty.英释: all the teachers in a university

bracket.英释: to consider two or more people or things as being similar or the same

highway.英释: a wide main road that joins one town to another

journey.英释: an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance

scholar.中释: 学者； 奖学金获得者
scholar.英释: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

endless.英释: very large in amount, size, or number

nuclear.中释: 核子的， 核能的， 核武器的； 核心的
nuclear.英释: relating to or involving the nucleus (= central part ) of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

outward.中释: 外面的； 外表的； 向外的
outward.英释: relating to how a person or situation seems to be, rather than how it really is

postage.英释: the money charged for sending a letter, package etc by post

blanket.中释: 毛毯， 毯子， 羊毛毯
blanket.英释: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

convert.中释: 转变， 转化； 改变
convert.英释: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

balance.中释: 天平； 平衡； 结存， 结欠
balance.英释: a state in which all your weight is evenly spread so that you do not fall

stadium.英释: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

whereas.中释: 然而， 但是， 尽管
whereas.英释: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

mention.英释: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details

nourish.英释: To nourish a person, animal, or plant means to provide them with the food that is necessary for life, growth, and good health

refugee.英释: someone who has been forced to leave their country, especially during a war, or for political or religious reasons

subject.英释: to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

bearing.中释: 举止， 风度； 方位， 方向感； 影响
bearing.英释: the way in which you move, stand, or behave, especially when this shows your character

compass.中释: 罗盘， 指南针； 圆规； 界限， 范围
compass.英释: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

dispose.中释: 处理， 解决； 使倾向于

curtain.英释: a piece of hanging cloth that can be pulled across to cover a window, divide a room etc

meaning.中释: 意义， 意思； 目的； 重要性
meaning.英释: the thing or idea that a word, expression, or sign represents

execute.中释: 将…处死； 实施， 执行
execute.英释: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment

vitamin.英释: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health

thereby.中释: 因此， 从而， 由此
thereby.英释: with the result that something else happens

funeral.中释: 葬礼， 丧礼， 丧葬
funeral.英释: a religious ceremony for burying or  cremating (= burning )  someone who has died

fireman.英释: a man whose job is to stop fires burning

sincere.英释: a feeling, belief, or statement that is sincere is honest and true, and based on what you really feel and believe

shelter.中释: 掩蔽， 庇护； 躲避
shelter.英释: to stay in or under a place where you are protected from the weather or from danger

abandon.英释: if someone does something with abandon, they behave in a careless or uncontrolled way, without thinking or caring about what they are doing

awkward.中释: 笨拙的， 尴尬的； 难操纵的， 使用不便的； 不灵巧的
awkward.英释: making you feel embarrassed so that you are not sure what to do or say

finding.中释: 发现； 调查的结果； 裁决
finding.英释: the information that someone has discovered as a result of their study, work etc

inspect.英释: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

amateur.英释: someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job

condemn.中释: 谴责， 指责； 判…刑， 宣告…有罪
condemn.英释: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

organic.中释: 有机体的， 有机物的
organic.英释: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

summary.英释: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details

removal.中释: 除去， 消除； 移动， 搬迁
removal.英释: when you get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

formula.中释: 公式， 方程式； 原则， 方案； 配方
formula.英释: a method or set of principles that you use to solve a problem or to make sure that something is successful

disgust.英释: a strong feeling of dislike, annoyance, or disapproval

balcony.中释: 阳台； 楼厅， 楼座
balcony.英释: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

grammar.英释: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules

biology.英释: the scientific study of living things

cherish.英释: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well

nursery.中释: 托儿所， 保育室； 苗圃
nursery.英释: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work

emperor.英释: the man who is the ruler of an empire

prolong.英释: to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer

scatter.中释: 撒， 散播； 散开， 驱散
scatter.英释: if someone scatters a lot of things, or if they scatter, they are thrown or dropped over a wide area in an irregular way

writing.英释: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject

federal.英释: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

academy.中释: 研究会， 学会； 专门学校
academy.英释: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

nucleus.英释: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles

culture.中释: 文化， 文明； 教养； 培养； 培养菌
culture.英释: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

butcher.英释: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat

chamber.中释: 会议室， 会所； 房间； 腔， 室
chamber.英释: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine

capture.中释: 捕获， 俘获； 夺得
capture.英释: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

arrival.中释: 到达， 到来； 到达者， 到达物
arrival.英释: when someone or something arrives somewhere

network.中释: 网状物； 广播网， 电视网； 网络
network.英释: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

jealous.中释: 妒忌的， 猜疑的； 精心守护的
jealous.英释: feeling unhappy because someone has something that you wish you had

instead.中释: 作为替代； 却， 反而
instead.英释: used to say what is done, when you have just said that a particular thing is not done

command.中释: 命令， 指挥， 控制
command.英释: to tell someone officially to do something, especially if you are a military leader, a king etc

leading.中释: 指导的， 带头的； 最主要的； 饰演主角的
leading.英释: The leading person or thing in a particular area is the one which is most important or successful

educate.中释: 教育， 培养， 训练
educate.英释: to teach a child at a school, college, or university

economy.中释: 经济； 节约， 节省
economy.英释: something that you do in order to spend less money

airport.英释: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

shortly.中释: 立刻， 不久； 不耐烦地； 简短地

descend.中释: 下来， 下降； 下倾
descend.英释: to move from a higher level to a lower one

logical.中释: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的

handbag.英释: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things

respect.英释: to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

baggage.英释: the cases, bags, boxes etc carried by someone who is travelling

stretch.中释: 一段时间， 一段路程， 连绵的一片； 伸展， 延伸

mixture.英释: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

horizon.中释: 地平线； 眼界， 见识
horizon.英释: the line far away where the land or sea seems to meet the sky

charter.英释: to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc

explode.英释: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

whistle.英释: a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it

compose.中释: 组成， 构成； 创作， 为…谱曲； 使平静， 使镇静
compose.英释: to write a piece of music

partial.中释: 部分的； 不公平的； 偏爱的， 偏袒的

skilled.中释: 有技能的； 熟练的； 需要技能的
skilled.英释: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well

species.英释: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

expense.中释: 花费， 消费； 费用， 开支； 业务费用
expense.英释: the amount of money that you spend on something

elderly.中释: 到了晚年的人， 老年人
elderly.英释: The elderly are people who are old

pollute.中释: 弄脏， 污染； 腐蚀
pollute.英释: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

pronoun.英释: a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase, such as ‘he’ instead of ‘Peter’ or ‘the man’

chemist.英释: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in chemistry

radical.英释: someone who has new and different ideas, especially someone who wants complete social and political change

whisper.英释: a very quiet voice you make using your breath and no sound

protein.英释: one of several natural substances that exist in food such as meat, eggs, and beans, and which your body needs in order to grow and remain strong and healthy

poverty.英释: the situation or experience of being poor

deposit.中释: 定金， 押金； 存款； 矿藏
deposit.英释: money that you pay when you rent something such as an apartment or car, which will be given back if you do not damage it

housing.中释: 房屋， 住宅； 住房建筑， 住房供给； 外壳， 外罩
housing.英释: the houses or conditions that people live in

fertile.中释: 肥沃的； 多产的； 丰富的
fertile.英释: fertile land or soil is able to produce good crops

tractor.英释: a strong vehicle with large wheels, used for pulling farm machinery

empower.英释: to give a person or organization the legal right to do something

classic.中释: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
classic.英释: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

wealthy.英释: having a lot of money, possessions etc

segment.英释: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

helpful.中释: 给予帮助的； 有用的
helpful.英释: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

trumpet.英释: to tell everyone about something that you are proud of, especially in an annoying way

absence.中释: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
absence.英释: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

attract.英释: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

edition.英释: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in

conquer.中释: 征服， 战胜； 破除， 克服
conquer.英释: to get control of a country by fighting

learned.中释: 有学问的； 学术上的
learned.英释: a learned person has a lot of knowledge because they have read and studied a lot

discard.中释: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
discard.英释: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

anxious.中释: 忧虑的， 令人焦急的； 渴望的

utilize.英释: to use something for a particular purpose

cushion.中释: 垫子， 坐垫， 靠垫
cushion.英释: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

climate.中释: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
climate.英释: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

section.中释: 部分， 章节； 部门， 科； 截面， 剖面
section.英释: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

package.英释: to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

glimpse.英释: a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly

veteran.英释: someone who has been a soldier, sailor etc in a war

outside.英释: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre

patient.英释: someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

cashier.英释: someone whose job is to receive or pay out money in a shop

miracle.中释: 奇迹， 令人惊奇的人
miracle.英释: an action or event believed to be caused by God, which is impossible according to the ordinary laws of nature

handful.中释: 一把， 少数， 一小撮
handful.英释: an amount that you can hold in your hand

kingdom.英释: a country ruled by a king or queen

various.中释: 各种各样的， 不同的
various.英释: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

textile.英释: any type of woven cloth that is made in large quantities, used especially by people in the business of making clothes etc

isolate.英释: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things

partner.英释: one of two people who are married, or who live together and have a sexual relationship

clarify.英释: to make something clearer or easier to understand

furnace.中释: 炉子， 熔炉， 鼓风炉
furnace.英释: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal

thunder.中释: 雷，雷声；擂鼓般的响声，轰隆声
thunder.英释: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning

furnish.中释: 供应， 提供； 装备

garbage.中释: 垃圾， 废物； 废话； 无用的资料
garbage.英释: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

anxiety.中释: 焦虑， 忧虑； 渴望， 热望
anxiety.英释: a feeling of wanting to do something very much

depress.中释: 使沮丧； 使不景气； 削弱， 抑制
depress.英释: to make someone feel very unhappy

digital.英释: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

counter.中释: 柜台； 计数器； 筹码
counter.英释: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

publish.中释: 公布， 发表； 出版， 刊印
publish.英释: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

feather.英释: one of the light soft things that cover a bird’s body

fulfill.中释: 履行， 实现， 完成； 满足， 使满意

crystal.中释: 水晶， 结晶体， 晶粒

ability.中释: 能力， 本领； 才能， 才智
ability.英释: the state of being able to do something

slender.中释: 细长的， 苗条的； 微薄的， 不足的
slender.英释: thin in an attractive or graceful way

married.英释: having a husband or a wife

license.英释: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

storage.英释: the process of keeping or putting something in a special place while it is not being used

somehow.中释: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式
somehow.英释: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how

cripple.英释: to hurt someone badly so that they cannot walk properly

readily.中释: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即

episode.中释: 一个事件； 插曲， 片段； 连续剧的一集
episode.英释: a television or radio programme that is one of a series of programmes in which the same story is continued each week

scandal.中释: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨
scandal.英释: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people

exhibit.英释: something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

disturb.中释: 打扰， 扰乱； 弄乱； 使不安
disturb.英释: to interrupt someone so that they cannot continue what they are doing

persist.英释: to continue to do something, although this is difficult, or other people oppose it

cartoon.中释: 卡通画， 幽默画； 动画片， 卡通片
cartoon.英释: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings

beloved.中释: 所钟爱的， 所爱戴的

elastic.英释: Elastic is a rubber material that stretches when you pull it and returns to its original size and shape when you let it go. Elastic is often used in clothes to make them fit tightly, for example, around the waist.

confine.中释: 限制， 使局限； 使不外出， 禁闭
confine.英释: to keep someone in a place that they cannot leave, such as a prison

luggage.英释: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling

missile.中释: 导弹， 飞弹， 投射物
missile.英释: a weapon that can fly over long distances and that explodes when it hits the thing it has been aimed at

dynamic.英释: something that causes action or change

unusual.中释: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
unusual.英释: different from what is usual or normal

extreme.英释: a situation, quality etc which is as great as it can possibly be – used especially when talking about two opposites

athlete.英释: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

failure.中释: 失败， 失败的人； 失灵， 故障； 不履行
failure.英释: a lack of success in achieving or doing something

support.中释: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
support.英释: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

deceive.中释: 欺骗， 蒙蔽， 行骗
deceive.英释: to make someone believe something that is not true

missing.英释: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it

gradual.中释: 逐渐的， 渐进的； 坡度平缓的
gradual.英释: happening slowly over a long period of time

seminar.英释: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject

leather.英释: animal skin that has been treated to preserve it, and is used for making shoes, bags etc

freight.英释: to send goods by air, sea, or train

confess.中释: 供认， 坦白； 承认
confess.英释: to admit, especially to the police, that you have done something wrong or illegal

precise.中释: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
precise.英释: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

emotion.中释: 情感， 感情； 激动
emotion.英释: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

minimum.英释: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary

apology.中释: 道歉， 认错， 谢罪
apology.英释: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

vibrate.英释: if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

sausage.英释: a small tube of skin filled with a mixture of meat, spices etc, eaten hot or cold after it has been cooked

hopeful.英释: believing that what you hope for is likely to happen

barrier.中释: 栅栏； 检票口； 屏障； 障碍， 隔阂
barrier.英释: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

enforce.中释: 实施， 执行； 强制， 强迫， 迫使
enforce.英释: to make people obey a rule or law

embassy.中释: 大使馆； 大使馆全体成员
embassy.英释: a group of officials who represent their government in a foreign country, or the building they work in

balloon.英释: an object made of brightly coloured thin rubber, that is filled with air and used as a toy or decoration for parties

limited.英释: not very great in amount, number, ability etc

fearful.中释: 害怕的， 可怕的； 不安的， 忧虑的
fearful.英释: frightened that something bad might happen

carrier.中释: 运输工具， 运载工具； 带菌者； 载重架， 置物架
carrier.英释: a company that moves goods or passengers from one place to another

soluble.英释: a soluble substance can be  dissolved  in a liquid

amplify.英释: to make sound louder, especially musical sound

nervous.英释: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

express.英释: a train or bus that does not stop in many places and therefore travels quickly

imagine.英释: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

certain.英释: confident and sure, without any doubts

program.英释: a set of instructions given to a computer to make it perform an operation

illness.英释: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

English.英释: relating to England or its people

capital.英释: an important city where the main government of a country, state etc is

inhabit.英释: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there

gaseous.英释: like gas or in the form of gas

lecture.英释: to talk to a group of people on a particular subject, especially to students in a university

nothing.英释: to have no qualities or features that are similar to someone or something else

exactly.英释: used when emphasizing that something is no more and no less than a number or amount, or is completely correct in every detail

chimney.英释: a structure through which smoke or steam is carried up away from a fire, etc. and through the roof of a building; the part of this that is above the roof

meeting.英释: an event at which people meet to discuss and decide things

correct.英释: to make something right or to make it work the way it should

Marxism.英释: the system of political thinking invented by Karl Marx, which explains changes in history as the result of a struggle between social classes

library.英释: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

history.英释: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

foreign.英释: from or relating to a country that is not your own

farther.英释: more distant; a  comparative  form of ‘far’

compute.英释: to calculate a result, answer, sum etc

present.英释: the time that is happening now

explain.英释: to tell someone about something in a way that is clear or easy to understand

natural.英释: existing in nature and not caused, made, or controlled by people

freedom.英释: the right to do what you want without being controlled or restricted by anyone

drawing.英释: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

brother.英释: a male who has the same parents as you

tourist.英释: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday

believe.英释: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth

heavily.英释: in large amounts, to a high degree, or with great severity

operate.英释: to use and control a machine or equipment

bristle.英释: a short stiff hair that feels rough

sulphur.英释: a common light yellow chemical substance that burns with a very strong unpleasant smell, and is used in drugs, explosives, and industry. It is a chemical element :symbol S

January.英释: the first month of the year, between December and February

October.英释: the tenth month of the year, between September and November

glitter.英释: brightness consisting of many flashing points of light

dislike.英释: a feeling of not liking someone or something

monthly.英释: every month or once a month

produce.英释: to cause a particular result or effect

bicycle.英释: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing its pedals with your feet

healthy.英释: physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak

actress.英释: a woman who performs in a play or film

medical.英释: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

oppress.英释: to treat a group of people unfairly or cruelly, and prevent them from having the same rights that other people in society have

chicken.英释: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs

compile.英释: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

defence.英释: the act of protecting sb/sth from attack, criticism, etc.

popular.英释: liked by a lot of people

officer.英释: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

foolish.英释: a foolish action, remark etc is stupid and shows that someone is not thinking sensibly

captive.英释: someone who is kept as a prisoner, especially in a war

colonel.英释: a high rank in the army, Marines, or the US air force, or someone who has this rank

despise.英释: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something

another.英释: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

peasant.英释: a poor farmer who owns or rents a small amount of land, either in past times or in poor countries

collect.英释: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

careful.英释: giving a lot of attention to details

develop.英释: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

destroy.英释: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be used or repaired

heating.英释: the process of heating a building or room, considered especially from the point of view of how much this costs

sweater.英释: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

morning.英释: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

article.英释: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

musical.英释: relating to music or consisting of music

kitchen.英释: the room where you prepare and cook food

uniform.英释: a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

promise.英释: to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen

country.英释: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

America.英释: a name commonly used for the US

picture.英释: to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

traffic.英释: the vehicles moving along a road or street

reading.英释: the activity or skill of understanding written words

machine.英释: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

holiday.英释: a time of rest from work, school etc

diamond.英释: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry

general.英释: an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

however.英释: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

flavour.英释: the particular taste of a food or drink

central.英释: in the middle of an area or an object

himself.英释: used when the man or boy who performs an action is also affected by it

because.英释: used when you are giving the reason for something

contain.英释: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

landing.英释: the action of bringing an aircraft down to the ground after being in the air

between.英释: in or into the space separating two or more points, objects, people, etc.

cunning.英释: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want

forgive.英释: to stop being angry with someone and stop blaming them, although they have done something wrong

comfort.英释: to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

cottage.英释: a small house in the country

clothes.英释: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm

century.英释: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

purpose.英释: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

manager.英释: someone whose job is to manage part or all of a company or other organization

clearly.英释: in a way that is easy to see, hear, or understand

drought.英释: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

Britain.英释: the island containing England, Scotland and Wales, Great Britain

postman.英释: someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters

already.英释: before now or before a particular time in the pas

discuss.英释: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

biscuit.英释: a small thin dry cake that is usually sweet and made for one person to eat

blossom.英释: if trees blossom, they produce flowers

British.英释: relating to Britain or its people

breathe.英释: to take air into your lungs and send it out again

college.英释: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

opinion.英释: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

Oceania.英释: a large region of the world consisting of the Pacific islands and the seas around them

cigaret.英释: (cigarette)a thin tube of paper filled with finely cut tobacco that people smoke

example.英释: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

lantern.英释: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

declare.英释: to state sth firmly and clearly

strange.英释: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before

eastern.英释: in or from the east of a country or area

herself.英释: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

neither.英释: not one or the other of two people or things

forward.英释: towards a place or position that is in front of you

fortune.英释: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

Arabian.英释: relating to Arabia or its people

naughty.英释: a naughty child does not obey adults and behaves badly

realize.英释: to know and understand something, or suddenly begin to understand it

message.中释: 信息，消息；启示，要旨，寓意
message.英释: a spoken or written piece of information that you send to another person or leave for them

lighten.英释: to become brighter or less dark, or to make something brighter etc

hundred.英释: a very large number of things or people

control.英释: the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

disable.英释: to make someone unable to use a part of their body properly

concert.英释: a performance given by musicians or singers

comrade.英释: a friend, especially someone who shares difficult work or danger

hostess.英释: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

captain.英释: a military officer with a fairly high rank

protect.英释: to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, or illness

willing.英释: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

quarter.英释: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

lightly.英释: with only a small amount of weight or force

company.英释: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

courage.英释: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

husband.英释: the man that a woman is married to

haircut.英释: when you have a haircut, someone cuts your hair for you

cordial.英释: friendly but quite polite and formal

outdoor.英释: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building

examine.英释: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

silence.英释: to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

perhaps.英释: used to say that something may be true, but you are not sure

perfect.英释: not having any mistakes, faults, or damage

factory.英释: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

against.英释: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

evening.英释: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

ceiling.英释: the inner surface of the top part of a room

mercury.英释: Mercury is a silver-coloured liquid metal that is used especially in thermometers and barometers

darling.英释: used when speaking to someone you love

England.英释: a division of the United Kingdom

feeling.英释: an emotion that you feel, such as anger, sadness, or happiness

million.英释: an extremely large number of people or things

heroine.英释: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave

cricket.英释: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks
